tool_description: Scan your content for pirated links and sources.
name: piracy
title: piracy

api_list.name: Pirated Content Check
api_list.description: This end point can be used to check if your content has pirated links. This will provide list of violations, violation count, and whether the content has anything pirated.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://piracy.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piracy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://piracy.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piracy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
